author: Durk
install_msg: Thanks for installing LokiLogger! Use `[p]help LokiLogger` for a list of commands.
name: LokiLogger
short: Fetches Loki logs and posts them to a channel.
description: A Redbot cog to periodically fetch error logs from a Loki API, post them to a designated Discord channel, and optionally ping a role.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Loki API endpoint, channel ID, and role ID for its operation.
